gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਾਧਸੰਗੁ ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵ ਪੂਰਨ ਬ੍ਹਮ ਸਰਬਾਤਮ ਕੈ ਜਾਨੀਅੈ
transliteration: Gurmukhi Saadhasangu Sabad Surati Liva , Pooran Braham Sarabaatam Kai Jaaneeai ?
translation: A Guru-conscious person strings the word divine in the thread of his consciousness in the company of saintly persons. He acknowledges the presence of omnipresent Lord in the form of soul in every one.

gurmukhi: ਸਹਜ ਸੁਭਾੲਿ ਰਿਦੈ ਭਾਵਨੀ ਭਗਤਿ ਭਾੲਿ ਬਿਹਸਿ ਮਿਲਨ ਸਮਦਰਸ ਧਿਅਾਨੀਅੈ
transliteration: Sahaj Soubhaai Ridai Bhaavanee Bhagati Bhaai , Bihasi Milan Samadaras Dhiaaneeai ?
translation: He is ever engrossed in the love and faith of the Guru Lord in his mind. He treats all alike and smilingly too.

gurmukhi: ਨਿਮ੍ਰਤਾ ਨਿਵਾਸ ਦਾਸ ਦਾਸਨ ਦਾਸਾਨ ਮਤਿ ਮਧੁਰ ਬਚਨ ਮੁਖ ਬੇਨਤੀ ਬਖਾਨੀਅੈ
transliteration: Nimrataa Nivaas Daas Daasan Daasaan Mati , Madhur Bachan Moukh Baynatee Bakhaaneeai ?
translation: The Guru-conscious person who ever lives in the presence of the True Guru is always humble and has the intellect of being the slave of slaves (of the Guru). And when he speaks, his words are sweet and full of supplication.

gurmukhi: ਪੂਜਾ ਪ੍ਰਾਨ ਗਿਅਾਨ ਗੁਰ ਅਾਗਿਅਾਕਾਰੀ ਅਗ੍ਰਭਾਗ ਅਾਤਮ ਅਵੇਸ ਪਰਮਾਤਮ ਨਿਧਾਨੀਅੈ ॥੧੩੭॥
transliteration: Poojaa Praan Giaan Gur Aagiaakaaree Agrabhaaga , Aatam Avays Paramaatam Nidhaaneeai ?137?
translation: A Guru-oriented person remembers Him with every breath and stays in Lord's presence like an obedient being. Thus his soul remains absorbed in the treasure house of peace and tranquillity. (137)
